content: I think I'll start with the largest frame and work my way down. I'll also make sure to leave some breathing room between the frames to create a sense of visual flow. One thing I'm still deciding on is whether to hang the frames in a loose, organic way or to create a more structured arrangement. Do you have any thoughts on that? By the way, last Thursday's big job in the living room really paid off - the room feels so much lighter and airier now.
